Package ohos.miscservices.download

Class DownloadConfig.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.miscservices.download.DownloadConfig.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    DownloadConfig

    public static class DownloadConfig.Builder
extends Object
    Provides Builder objects of download configuration, including methods to set parameters used to create a download session.
    Since:
    1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Builder​(Context context, Uri uri)
      A constructor used to create a Builder instance for download session configuration.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder​(Context context,
               Uri uri)
        A constructor used to create a Builder instance for download session configuration.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        uri - Indicates an HTTP URI referenced to the file to be download.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - uri is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - context is null, uri scheme is not http or https.

    • Method Detail

      • setPath

        public DownloadConfig.Builder setPath​(String dir,
                                      String subPath)
        Sets the path for downloads.

        Downloaded files can be stored in an application directory or a public system directory.

        Parameters:
        dir - Indicates a path.

        To download files to a system directory, use one defined in ohos.utils.Environment, for example, ohos.utils.Environment#DIRECTORY_DOWNLOAD, ohos.utils.Environment#DIRECTORY_MUSIC, and ohos.utils.Environment#DIRECTORY_PODCASTS.

        To download files to an internal path of the application, set this parameter to null.

        subPath - Indicates a subpath containing the name of the downloads.
        Returns:
        Returns a Builder object.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Throws this exception if the path is invalid.
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if subPath is null.

      • addHttpheader

        public DownloadConfig.Builder addHttpheader​(String header,
                                            String content)
        Adds an HTTP or HTTPS header to be included with the download request.

        The header will be added to the end of the list.

        Parameters:
        header - Indicates the HTTP header name.
        content - Indicates the HTTP header value.
        Returns:
        Returns a Builder object.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - header is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - http header may not contain ':'.

      • setTitle

        public DownloadConfig.Builder setTitle​(String title)
        Sets a download session title.

        If system download notifications are enabled for the application, the title will be displayed in the download session notification.

        Parameters:
        title - Indicates the download session title.
        Returns:
        Returns a Builder object.

      • setDescription

        public DownloadConfig.Builder setDescription​(String description)
        Sets the description of a download session.

        If system download notifications are enabled for the application, the description will be displayed in the download session notification.

        Parameters:
        description - Indicates the description of the download session.
        Returns:
        Returns a Builder object.

      • setNetworkRestriction

        public DownloadConfig.Builder setNetworkRestriction​(int flag)
        Sets the network type allowed for download.

        By default, both of the two network types are allowed.

        Parameters:
        flag - Indicates the network type, which can be a combination of bit flags for the cellular network and WLAN.
        Returns:
        Returns a Builder object.
        See Also:
        DownloadConfig.NETWORK_MOBILE, DownloadConfig.NETWORK_WIFI

      • setDownloadRange

        public DownloadConfig.Builder setDownloadRange​(int offset,
                                               int size)
        Sets the start offset and size for the fragment download request.
        Parameters:
        offset - Indicates the offset (bytes) from which the download starts. The default value is -1. A negative value means that the download starts from the file header.
        size - Indicates the size of each fragment, in bytes. The default value is 0. Only a value greater than 0 takes effect, which indicates that the download ends at offset + size. If the sum exceeds the target file size or size is set to a negative value, the download ends where the file ends.
        Returns:
        Returns a Builder object.

      • enableRoaming

        public DownloadConfig.Builder enableRoaming​(boolean flag)
        Allows download in a roaming network. Download in a roaming network is allowed by default.
        Parameters:
        flag - Indicates whether download is allowed in a roaming network. Value true means it is allowed, and false means the opposite.
        Returns:
        Returns a Builder object.

      • enableMetered

        public DownloadConfig.Builder enableMetered​(boolean flag)
        Allows download under a metered connection. Download under a metered connection is allowed by default.
        Parameters:
        flag - Indicates whether to allow download when using a metered connection. Value true means this is allowed, and false means the opposite.
        Returns:
        Returns a Builder object.

      • build

        public DownloadConfig build​()
        Creates a DownloadConfig object.
        Returns:
        Returns the created object.
